𓆃 wing / feather

𓇋 feather 𒁁𒋻 pattar 𓆄 pter πτερόν pterón 𓃀 𓆄 𓏏 𓏤 𓆃 (bunt plumage) базыр bazyr
𓇋 feather ⇔ fiffike @ Hausa φτερό fteró fur אֶבְרָה evra

𒁇 BAR branch, wing

𒁇 BAR 𒉺 pa 𒁇 pa9 𓆃 wing

𒉺 pa 𒁇 pa9 𑜆𑜢𑜀𑜫 pik 𓆃 "wing" 𒉺 pa 𒁇 pa9 pakpak 𓆃 "wing" 𒉺 pa 𒁇 pa9 <> arpã aripã "wing"

𒉺 kappum כנפא kenpā, kanpā "wing"

𔑗 ALA axis/wing 𓆃 !?

Wanderwort, root in three branches:
𓆄 𓅱 𓏏 𓆃 feather
𓂧 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 #dnḫ "Daunen" down feathers
𓂧 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 Deneb @ Schwan(s) Schwanz “al-Dhanab” <> 𓂧 𓂋 𓄛 tail
𓆓 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 ḏnḥ ⲧⲉⲛϩ tᵊnh ডানা ḍana дамэ dāmă тамэ tāmă جَنَاح janāḥ
𓆓 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 جَنَاح janāḥ qanat канат ganat كَنَف kanaf қанат kanat כָּנָף kanáf ክንፍ kənf 𐎋𐎐𐎔 knp (𓂧 χειρ 𓆓 Ka)
𓆓 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 ⇔ 𐎋𐎐𐎔 ⇔ knip™ kneif (nip feathers) 𐎔 con.ptera כנפא kenpā, kanpā 𒉺 kappum "wing" 𓂧 𓌳 𓏏 𓆃 djanat (𓌳 new) :
𓂧 𓌳 𓇦 | bind together | δyn δym sym syn δescim 𓇦 同 带

π pi-form πтамэ πtāmă πέτομαι péth₂r̥ feather Federn 𓇋 @ 𓆃

𓎼 𓃀 𓅬 | goose | 𒀀𒃮𒁍 a-gap-pu wing

𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 𓆃 | fly | πτερό < πṭāra طار (ṭār) < 𓅂 tyw® طير (ṭīr)
𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 𓆃 | fly | πετῶ petô #pꜣj phlai ⇔ πτερό opter :
𓂝 𓊪 𓆃 | fly up |
𓂝 𓆑 𓆑 𓅭 | fly off | עף 'af !
𓄿 𓊪 𓂧 𓅬 | bird | avis avi… (aviation):
𓄿 𓊪 𓂧 𓅬 | duck | ⇔ 𓂋 𓊪 𓅯 Erpel @ Airped/pod

𓂧 𓎼 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀃 𓅭 duckit

𓊪 𓅮 ⲡϩⲁⲗⲏⲧ p-halēt “bird“ flutter vol… Vogel Vieh
𓊪 𓅮 ⲡϩⲁⲗⲏⲧ p-halēt flat ⇔ ⲡⲉϫⲓⲧ peϫit 𓊪 𓈎 𓏗, 𓊪 𓅮 𓈎 𓏗, 𓆁 𓈎 𓏗
𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 𓈎 𓏏 𓆁 𓂂 | potsherd
𓊪 𓅮 : Pflt > FLt
𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 𓆃 | fly, fly up | phlai® pta flutter ⇔ ⲡϩⲁⲗⲏⲧ p-halēt “bird“
𓊪 𓅮 𓊃 𓏋 flask (water pot) > POß > Wasser Fass
𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 𓅱 𓀁 > false(hood)
𓊪 𓅮 𓄿 𓂧 𓏒 flat-loaf ( Fladen Brot > food )
𓊪 𓅮 𓆓 𓏐 Fladen (a loaf )
𓊪 𓅮 𓏏 𓏗 oblate!? ( cake, loaf (used in offerings))

𓊪 𓅮 fly 𓆦 ⇔ off 𓅯 𓆃
𓂝 𓊪 𓆃 | fly up |
𓂝 𓆑 𓆑 𓅭 | fly off | עף 'af !

𓋴 𓍋 𓃀 𓆄 𓏏 𓏤 𓆃 𓏥 | many coloured variegated of plumage | 色 sè.bunt (色:巴 sè:bā)

unfamiliar wanderwort :
𓂧 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 ⲧⲉⲛϩ ডানা ḍana δjanahh AR+++ wing Aze cinah, Per janahh ⇔ Daune down (soft, immature feather)
𓂧 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 ⲧⲉⲛϩ тамэ tāmă дамэ dāmă ডানা ḍana djanat جَنَاح janāḥ جناح genāḥ (𓂧:ch)
𓂧 𓌳 𓏏 𓆃 qanat канат ganat كَنَف kanaf қанат kanat כָּנָף kanáf ክንፍ kənf 𐎋𐎐𐎔 knp … ⇔ ƙafa ?

𓆃 ⇔ ҡанат qanat ganat gwinger qwinged swings 𐍃𐍅𐌴𐌲𐌽𐌹𐌸𐌰 Schwinge
𓆓 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 ⇔ ডানা ḍana djanaḥ جَنَاح janāḥ جناح genāḥ
𓂧 𓌳 𓏏 𓆃 ⇔ chanaut ክንፍ

𓆃 جناح genāḥ ⇔ قرن gərn horn

𓂧 𓃀 𓄏 | horn (of animal), wing (of army) | •δabhuron > horn ⇔ cherubin? sarvi@FIN
𓂧 𓃀 𓄏 | horn (of animal), wing (of army) | •δabhur™ 𒀉𒌋𒆤 /sappartu/
𓂧 𓃀 𓄏 | horn (of animal), wing (of army) | •δabhur shabbur > שופֿר שׁוֹפָר shofár sheep/Schaf-horn AR ++
𓂧 𓃀 𓄏 ⇔ khanph כָּנָף kanáf 𐎋𐎐𐎔 knp [rare reading khan𓂧>hand ]
𓂧 𓃀 𓄏 ⇔ cheirbon ⇔ khorn
𓂧 𓃀 𓄏 ⇔ chebin ⇔ gwinge 𐍃𐍅𐌴𐌲𐌽𐌹 swings

The p-t change at the end indicates a deep root from 𓅮𓊪𓏏 Opterix 𓇋 ფრთა prta feather/fly •conopter

The only obvious english representative of this cluster other might be 𐎋𐎐𐎔 canopy 𓆃 ⋍ 🌴 < κωνωπεῖον (Vorhang) ?

Another deep root could be 𓆃 ⋍ 𓂧 kanat ⋍ Khand (Hand⋍Kante reconstructed before)

H5 𓆃 swings ⇔ 𓆄 (Flederner)Flüg(el) 𓆃 ⋍ N58 𓆃 oPTHer ⇔ feather

𓂧 𓈖 𓎛 𓆃 dwinga ?
